```{r setup, message = F}
library(tidyverse)
library(vegan) # install this in your Console: install.packages("vegan")
data(mite)
data(mite.env)
mite_dat <- mite.env %>%
  add_column(abundance = mite$LRUG)
```

```{r}
# SLR
m1 <- lm(abundance ~ WatrCont, data = mite_dat)
summary(m1)

# MLR
m2 <- lm(abundance ~ WatrCont + SubsDens, data = mite_dat)
summary(m2)
```
